question: Laughing Buddha is popularly regarded as an incarnation of which of the following Bodhisattvas?
explanation: Budai or laughing Buddha is claimed to be an incarnation of Maitreya. Budai was a Chinese Zen monk who lived during the Later Liang Dynasty (907â€“923 CE) in China. In Japanese, he is called Hotei and is one of the 7 Lucky Gods of Japan
